attributes.action: make free dental care for everybody in the UK law
attributes.additional_details: Free dental care is essential to make the British workforce productive and efficient, whilst giving everybody a pain free existence. Lower paid workers do not have the money to spend on their teeth and often suffer as a consequence. Teeth are a basic requirement for a happy and healthy life, so why shouldn't everybody be able to get free dental care.
attributes.background: Free dental care for all British Citizens
